Class Invader

java.lang.Object
  Item
      Invader

public class Invader
extends Item

Invader is an item that starts from top of Space and zigzags down toward the bottom! It now also shoots from time to time (randomly 30% of the time)

Version:
assign2
Author:
babak

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class Item
env, x, y
 
Constructor Summary
Invader(int x, int y, Space s)
          Initialize the location and space as per the supplied parameters.
Invader(Space s)
          Assign the space, give an initial position (0, 0) and set initial direction to true (East)
 
Method Summary
 void move()
          Move the invader following the instructions in the assignment: each move step moves the invader one step further in its current direction (West or East) until it hits the edge of space, in which case it moves down one step and switches directions for the next move.

               int y,

Invader

public Invader(Space s)
Assign the space, give an initial position (0, 0) and set initial direction to true (East)

Method Detail

move

public void move()
Move the invader following the instructions in the assignment: each move step moves the invader one step further in its current direction (West or East) until it hits the edge of space, in which case it moves down one step and switches directions for the next move. Also: it should shoot (direction: south) randomly, with a 30% probability.
